<CodeGroup>
  ```python Python
  from notte_sdk import NotteClient

  client = NotteClient()

  # Captcha solving requires Firefox
  with client.Session(
      solve_captchas=True,
      browser_type="firefox"
  ) as session:
      page = session.page
      page.goto("https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api2/demo")
      # Captchas are automatically solved
  ```
</CodeGroup>
